name: linkedin-mcp-fps
description: MCP server that provides LinkedIn job search, scraping, and CV adaptation functionality
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that enables LinkedIn job searching, detailed job metadata extraction, and CV adaptation based on job requirements. Features include job search URL generation, job ID retrieval, job metadata scraping with caching, and intelligent CV customization.

tools.name: get_url_for_jobs_search
tools.description: Generate LinkedIn job search URLs with location, distance, and query parameters

tools.name: get_new_job_ids
tools.description: Retrieve job IDs from LinkedIn job search pages with pagination support

tools.name: get_jobs_raw_metadata
tools.description: Extract detailed job metadata including title, company, location, description, and requirements

tools.name: adapt_cv_to_latest_job
tools.description: Adapt Francisco's CV to match specific job requirements and descriptions
